column10: when turning right from Legato to Ruffin can see the street and people crossing due to parked cars on street.

This intersection needs to change. Kids cannot safely cross the street even though there is a crosswalk. Drivers can't see the pedestrians at the corner because cars are allowed to park too close to the corner. I wonder if a stop sign could be added.
A car was parked at the intersection of Dixie hill and greenshaw. It was blocking the crosswalk causing unsafe conditions for the elementary aged children who were walking to school.
column21: I have a photo of the incident. Please email me for a copy.
